chapters.summaryKo: 가이오의 신실함을 칭찬하고 디오드레베를 경계하며 데메드리오를 추천합니다.
chapters.summaryEn: Commends Gaius' faithfulness, warns against Diotrephes, recommends Demetrius.
chapters.messageKo: 사랑하는 자여 네 영혼이 잘됨 같이 네가 범사에 잘되고 강건하기를 내가 간구하노라.
chapters.messageEn: Dear friend, I pray that you may enjoy good health and that all may go well with you, even as your soul is getting along well.

keyEvents.eventEn: Pray all go well as your soul prospers

keyEvents.eventKo: 내 자녀들이 진리 안에서 행함을 들음이 최고의 기쁨
keyEvents.eventEn: Greatest joy is children walking in truth

keyEvents.eventKo: 형제들과 나그네들에게 행한 것은 신실한 일
keyEvents.eventEn: Faithful in what you do for brothers and strangers
Do not imitate evil but good
Demetrius well spoken of by everyone
